summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Import/Export module. All 24 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI verified - Export Data tab shows Finance (5 types) and CRM (3 types) data categories, Import Data tab shows warning about imported data restrictions and EXCLUDED from live calculations, Import History tab shows past import operations with audit log.
passed_tests: GET /api/admin/export/types - Returns Finance (5 types) and CRM (3 types) export categories
GET /api/admin/import/types - Returns import types with required fields and duplicate strategies
GET /api/admin/import/types - Cashbook has correct required fields (date, type, amount, category_name, account_name)
POST /api/admin/export - Export cashbook data in CSV format works
POST /api/admin/export - Export leads data in Excel format works
POST /api/admin/export - Export with date filter works
POST /api/admin/import/preview - Preview import with CSV file works
POST /api/admin/import/execute - Execute import tags records with imported=true
Frontend: Export Data tab shows Finance Data section
Frontend: Export Data tab shows CRM Data section
Frontend: Export type cards visible (Cashbook, Receipts, Leads)
Frontend: Export button and format select visible
Frontend: Import Data tab shows warning about Imported Data Restrictions
Frontend: Import Data tab shows EXCLUDED from live calculations warning
Frontend: Import type cards visible (Cashbook, Leads)
Frontend: File input and Preview Import button visible
Frontend: Import History tab shows past import operations
Frontend: Import History shows audit log with import_id, type, file, rows, imported count, date, user
updated_files: /app/tests/test_import_export.py - Created comprehensive test file for Import/Export APIs
seed_data_creation: Test import created via test_execute.csv with 1 lead (TEST_Execute Lead, phone: 9999888877). Import audit log shows imp_ea69aa35b1e9.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Import/Export module fully tested. Key features: 1) Export - supports 8 data types (cashbook, receipts, liabilities, salaries, project_finance, leads, projects, customers) in CSV/Excel format with optional date filters, 2) Import - supports 6 data types (cashbook, receipts, liabilities, salaries, leads, projects) with dry-run preview, validation, duplicate detection (skip/update/create_new strategies), 3) All imported records are tagged with imported=true and EXCLUDED from live financial calculations (cash lock, safe surplus, spending eligibility), 4) Import History - audit log stored in import_audit_log collection. Collections: import_previews (temporary), import_audit_log. Sidebar shows 'Import / Export' link under Admin section.
